# Analisar as fotos

# Processamento em lote (validação)


```{r}
res_val <- 
analyze_objects(
  pattern = "-",
  dir_original = "figs/R50/",
  dir_processed = "figs/proc",
  index = "GRAY",
  marker = "point",
  marker_col = "red",
  save_image = TRUE,
  opening = 10,
  filter = 2
)
export(res_val$count, "validacao.xlsx")
```



# Cenário 100%
```{r}
# CENÁRIO COM IMAGENS ORIGINAIS
cenarios <- expand_grid(open = c(0, 25),
                        filt = c(0, 5))
results_100 <- 
  map_dfr(1:4, function(i){
    tp <- 
      system.time(
        res <- 
          analyze_objects(
            pattern = "-",
            dir_original = "figs/R100/",
            index = "GRAY",
            opening = cenarios[[i, 1]],
            filter = cenarios[[i, 2]],
            plot = FALSE
          )
      )
    res$count |> 
      mutate(filter = cenarios[[i, 2]],
             opening = cenarios[[i, 1]],
             resolucao = "100",
             tempo = as.numeric(tp)[3])
    
  })



# 50% DA RESOLUÇÃO
```
